GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews as objects

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all registered users as objects

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object matching the review_id specified in the URL
GET /api/reviews/:review_id.parameters: :review_id - must be an integer matching an existing review_id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array containing each comment linked to the review_id specified in the URL, with each comment as an object
GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.parameters: :review_id - must be an integer matching an existing review_id

comments.body: My dog loved this game too!
comments.author: someone else

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: inserts a comment into the database, linked to the review_id specified in the path. as per the user submitted data object.  Responds with the inserted object, proving insertion
POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.parameters: :review_id - must be an integer matching an existing review_id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates the votes number of a review record in the database, linked to the review_id specified in the path. as per the user submitted data object.  Responds with the updated review object, proving update
PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.parameters: :review_id - must be an integer matching an existing review_id
